summary: Idolaf gets a slight lift, more refined features, and better hair.
descriptionHtml:
Just another NPC that I\'ve touched up to look slightly better.  No drastic changes, and nothing that should cause grey-face bugs in your game.
As my other NPC makeover mods, this does NOT make him a follower in your game.

--Installation--
Download my main file, extract the files into your /Skyrim/Data folder, activate \"IdolafBattleBorn.esp\" in your data files, run game.

--Bugs/known issues--
I have a work around/fix if you encounter a neck seam:
Bring up the console with \" ~ \" button, target Idolaf, type setnpcweight 70, type disable, type enable. Should fix him from here on.

If you have any issues PLEASE let me know and I\'ll see what I can come up with for you.

Add Pics if you enjoy using my mod!  And don\'t forget to endorse me :)

--Mods Highly Recommended--
If you have not yet begun to use it, I highly recommend you get Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul found here:  
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/
Also I use a customized version of RealLike ENB by s3b3k87 found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22056/

UPDATE!! Idolaf may now be your follower or husband, by using this mod:
skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36520
author: Binmaru
